channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- MySQL Connectors
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- MySQL Connectors

item.title: CVE-2024-21090|2024-04-16T21:26:28.786Z -- Oracle Corporation -- MySQL Connectors
item.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Connectors product of Oracle MySQL (component: Connector/Python). Supported versions that are affected are 8.3.0 and prior. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Connectors. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQL Connectors. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 7.5 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).
